actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers.

titles.title: A bill to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers.
